channel.title: Projects on dane.
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on dane.

item.title: Running Comrades 2018 for Wildlands Trust
item.description: The Story Friends & Family, I would like to ask you for a favour: On the 4th of November 2017, after having run two previous marathons, I finally ran a time that qualified me for a spot in the 2 Oceans Ultra Marathon 2018, and the Comrades Marathon 2018. For the next 4 months - February, March, April and May - a massive volume of kilometers will be run in order to prepare for running the 89km from Pietermaritzburg down to Durban.
